table.name: vtiger_schedular
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_schedular` ( `schedularid` int(11) NOT NULL, `schedular_no` varchar(56) default NULL, `schedular_startdate` DATE NOT NULL, `schedular_enddate` DATE NOT NULL, `schedular_starttime` VARCHAR(8) NOT NULL, `schedular_endtime` VARCHAR(8) NOT NULL, `schedular_eventtype` VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`schedularid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_schedularcf
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_schedularcf` ( `schedularid` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`schedularid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_schedularsettings
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_schedularsettings` ( `schedular_settingsid` int(11) NOT NULL, `schedular_available_users` VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`schedular_settingsid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
